purpleculture_pinyin:
gū
surname Gu; crime; sin
фамилия Гу; преступление; грех
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 古 indicates the sound; 辛 (bitter) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
无辜 [ wú gū ]: innocent; innocence; not guilty (law)
辜负 [ gū fù ]: to fail to live up (to expectations); unworthy (of trust); to let down; to betray (hopes); to disappoint
死有余辜 [ sǐ yǒu yú gū ]: death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
辜鸿铭 [ gū hóng míng ]: Ku Hung-ming or Gu Hongming (1857-1928), Malaysian man of letters, highly regarded for his literary works written mostly in English, and known for his monarchist views
滥杀无辜 [ làn shā wú gū ]: willfully slaughter the innocent (idiom)

• ⿱ Above to below
    • 古 [ gǔ ] old, classic, ancient
    • 辛 [ xīn ] bitter; toilsome, laborious; 8th heavenly stem
heisig_chinese_memo: In ancient times it was a crime to throw away a chili pepper. They needed all the food they could get.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In ancient times it was a crime to throw away a chili pepper. They needed all the food they could get.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscriptions from " death " and " ancient " sound are also seen in the bamboo slips of Chu in Baoshan, which are consistent with the ancient prose of "Suowen" The characters of the Qin family in the Warring States period start from " Xin ", " Ancient " sound, and "Shuowen" Xiaozhuan.

The original meaning of " Gu " is a felony. "Shuowen": "Gu, Kuiye. From Xin, ancient sound." Duan Yucai's note: "According to "Gu" is a very felony, and by extension, all guilty is "Gu"." The inscription uses its original meaning, [妾子] 𧊒 Pot: "To worry about the people's fate (suffer) and not [古死] (gu)." It means to worry about their people's injustice. (Zhang Zhengwen) Another example is "Zuo Zhuan. Seventeenth Year of Cheng Gong": "If you kill the innocent, you will lose your people, and you will have peace and happiness?"

" Gu " can mean dismemberment and division. Such as "Zhou Li. Autumn official. Palm Slaughter: "Whoever kills his relatives, burns it; kills the king's relatives, Gu Zhi." Zheng Xuan's note: "Gu, it is called dying." "Han Feizi. On the internal reserve. "Seven Skills": "In the land of Jingnan, Lishui is rich in gold, and many people steal gold. The prohibition of gold mining makes it possible to get to the city." " Gu " and " Yeng " both mean split limbs.

" Gu " also means harm. Such as "Han Shu. "Wang Mang's Biography": "Then the cities under the world were made empty, hills and ridges were excavated, which harmed the living and the people, and the decayed bones. The autobiography of the chaos, the courtiers, the criminals and the innocent people. Also." Also used as a noun to mean disaster. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Wuhuan Xianbei": "In the early days of Guangwu, Wuhuan and the Xiongnu were invaders... the five counties were commonplaces, and their homes were harmed. As for the counties and counties were damaged, the people went into exile."

"Betrayal" means being sorry, owing a debt, or "being alone." Such as "Three Kingdoms. Shu Shu. "Huang Li Lu Ma Wang Zhang Biography" Pei Song’s note quotes Jin Chen Shou’s "Yibu Old Biography": "The minister is on duty as a sage, receives excessive grace, and suffers from disease. He often fears that he will die once and fail his honor." Tang On behalf of Chen Ziang's "Shen Zongren's Injustice": "The one who is in the past is the most loyal, and today he is bribed, betraying the Holy Lord, worrying and loving, sincerely hating."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscriptions from " death " and " ancient " sound, also seen in Baoshan Chujian, and are consistent with the ancient prose of Shuowen. The characters of the Qin family in the Warring States period start from " Xin ", " Ancient " sound, and "Shuowen" Xiaozhuan. The original meaning is a felony.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「死」，「古」聲，亦見於包山楚簡，與《說文》古文相合。戰國秦系文字從「辛」，「古」聲，《說文》小篆同。

　　「辜」的本義是重罪。《說文》：「辜，辠也。从辛，古聲。」段玉裁注：「按『辜』本非常重罪，引申之，凡有罪皆曰『辜』。」金文用其本義， [妾子]𧊒壺：「以憂氒（厥）民之隹（罹）不[古死]（辜）。」意謂憂其民遭遇冤屈。（張政烺）又如《左傳．成公十七年》：「若殺不辜，將失其民，欲安，得乎？」

　　「辜」可表示肢解、分裂。如《周禮．秋官．掌戮》：「凡殺其親者，焚之；殺王之親者，辜之。」鄭玄注：「辜，謂磔之。」《韓非子．內儲說上．七術》：「荊南之地，麗水之中生金，人多竊采金。采金之禁，得而輒辜磔於市。」「辜」、「磔」皆表示分裂肢體。

　　「辜」還表示禍害。如《漢書．王莽傳下》：「遂令天下城邑為虛，丘壟發掘，害徧生民，辜及朽骨，自書傳所載亂臣賊子無道之人，考其禍敗，未有如莽之甚者也。」又作名詞，表示災禍。如《後漢書．烏桓鮮卑列傳》：「光武初，烏桓與匈奴連兵為寇……五郡民庶，家受其辜，至於郡縣損壞，百姓流亡。」

　　「辜負」表示對不住、虧欠，亦作「孤負」。如《三國志．蜀書．黃李呂馬王張傳》裴松之注引晉陳壽《益部耆舊傳》：「臣當值聖明，受恩過量，加以疾病在身，常恐一朝隕沒，辜負榮遇。」唐代陳子昂〈申宗人冤獄書〉：「頃者至忠，而今日受賂，辜負聖主，憂及慈親，誠足痛恨。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「死」，「古」聲，亦見於包山楚簡，與《說文》古文相合。戰國秦系文字從「辛」，「古」聲，《說文》小篆同。本義是重罪。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
辜
Pinyin: gū
English Definition: surname Gu; crime; sin
Total strokes: 12; Radical: 辛
Pictophonetic: 古 indicates the sound; 辛 (bitter) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 古 [ gǔ ] old, classic, ancient
    • 辛 [ xīn ] bitter; toilsome, laborious; 8th heavenly stem
Step by Step Stroke Sequence: Download Customize Pin it
Example Words:
无辜 [ wú gū ]: innocent; innocence; not guilty (law)
辜负 [ gū fù ]: to fail to live up (to expectations); unworthy (of trust); to let down; to betray (hopes); to disappoint
死有余辜 [ sǐ yǒu yú gū ]: death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
辜鸿铭 [ gū hóng míng ]: Ku Hung-ming or Gu Hongming (1857-1928), Malaysian man of letters, highly regarded for his literary works written mostly in English, and known for his monarchist views
滥杀无辜 [ làn shā wú gū ]: willfully slaughter the innocent (idiom)

辜字的基本解释

辜
gū
罪：无辜。辜功（罪行）。死有余辜。
负，背：辜负。
姓。

辜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gū］
［《廣韻》古胡切，平模，見。］
(1)罪，罪过。
(2)加罪，惩处。
(3)灾难，祸害。
(4)仇，仇恨。
(5)磔。分裂肢体。
(6)辜负，对不住。
(7)农历十一月的别名。
(8)通“固”。固定。
(9)通“固”。必定。
(10)通“故”。缘故。
(11)姓。清有辜汤生。见《清史稿·文苑传三》。

辜字的英文翻译

◎ 辜
crime, guilt

辜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辛字部】　辜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1250第29
〔古文〕????【唐韻】古乎切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】攻乎切，?音姑。【說文】罪也。从辛古聲。【書·大禹謨】與其殺不辜，寧失不經。【周禮·夏官】以救無辜，伐有罪。　又必也。【前漢·律歷志】六律，姑洗。洗，絜也。言陽氣洗物辜絜之也。【註】辜絜，必使之絜也。　又磔也。【周禮·春官】以疈辜祭四方百物。【註】疈，披牲胷也。疈辜，披磔牲以祭也。　又障也。【後漢·靈帝紀】豪右辜榷。【註】謂障餘人賣買而自取其利也。一作辜較，義同。　又辜較，大槪也。詳車部較字註。　又月名。【爾雅·釋天】十一月爲辜。　又姓。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋歲】十一月爲辜月。〕　謹照原文釋歲改釋天。辜下省月字。
辜字的源字形

辜字的起名意思

暂无。

name.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gū］
["Guang Yun" Gu Hu cut, flat model, see you. ]
(1) Sin, sin.
(2) Add crime and punish.
(3) Disasters, scourges.
(4) Enmity, hatred.
(5) 磔. Split limbs.
(6) Let me down, sorry.
(7) Alias of November in the lunar calendar.
(8) Through "solid". fixed.
(9) Through "solid". Definitely.
(10) Through the "so". reason.
(11) Last name. Qingyougu Tangsheng. See "Manuscripts of Qing History·Wenyuan Biography III".

辜
形声字。辛表意,辛是古代一种刑刀,用来在罪人的脸上刺字以便识别;古(ga)表声,古本作故解,表示按照过去的案
例定罪。本义是古代一种分解肢体的酷刑。引申为罪。
①罪:无~「死有余~。②违背:~负|~恩背义。
~负 无~ 死有余~

Пиктофонетические символы.
Синь заявляет, что Синь - это древний нож пыток, который использовался для татуировки на лице грешника для идентификации; древнее (га) выражает звук, а древняя версия делает вид, что выражает убеждение в соответствии с прошлыми случаями.
Первоначальный смысл - древняя пытка сломать конечности.
Расширен как преступление.
